name: Delicious Duck Confit
desc: A pan-fried dish. With the magic of "confit," the plump and meaty duck leg is cooked until crispy on the outside and meltingly tender on the inside — one cannot help but exclaim that every second spent on this dish is worth it!

value.text: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

customize.name: Recipe: Duck Confit
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Duck Confit.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Duck Confit
customize.desc: A pan-fried dish. The duck leg has been seasoned with spices and salt and then rinsed clean before being poached in duck fat. The confit is seared before being served. The meat goes deliciously well with potatoes sautéed in duck fat.

customize.name: Suspicious Duck Confit
customize.desc: A pan-fried dish. The duck leg seems ready to fall apart at any moment, and the first bite coats your mouth with grease. There's even something that doesn't quite fit with this texture — ugh, is that a duck feather?
